ThingDef.label: Fart Gun
ThingDef.description: A gun that does no damage but forces the victim on the recieving end to let out a loud and smelly fart. This embarrases the victim because everyone in the room will hear and smell it!

ThingDef.label: The Super Pistol
ThingDef.description: A multi-barrel pistol with an extremely high rate of fire. While it is a very deadly weapon, it does have several drawbacks. It fires in uncontrollable 15-round bursts. It's also not very accurate due to it's unwieldly weight and size.

ThingDef.label: Raid Gun
ThingDef.description: Need a raid? This gun causes raids with a random amount of points.

ThingDef.label: House Gun
ThingDef.description: Need a house? This gun spawns random buildings for you.

ThingDef.label: Cat Gun
ThingDef.description:
A gun that turns whatever it hits into a cat. This highly multipurpose gun has almost an unlimited number of applications with virtually no drawbacks. Is there an enemy raid going on? Turn those bastards into a bunch of cats! Is a particularly annoying pawn having an episode for the zillionth time? Turn that sucker into a cat! Cats NEVER go on insulting sprees. They are also ok with eating without a table. Is there an army of boomalopes that could blow up an entire continent? Turn them into an army of cats! Merchants ripping you off again? Oh well, I guess you'll just have to turn them all into cats. Is there a forest of trees in the way? How about you make it into a forest of cats?
The cat gun is indubidubly the best gun for every situation imaginable. If you haven't already armed every single one of your pawns with one, YOU ARE AN IDIOT!

ThingDef.label: Cat Swarm Gun
ThingDef.description: Is the Cat Gun just not making enough cats for you? Well, with the Cat Swarm Gun, that's no longer a problem! I'm sure you can guess what it does just by reading the name...

ThingDef.label: Bad Cat Swarm Gun
ThingDef.description: A BAZILLION BERZERK CATS!! WTF!!!

ThingDef.label: The Health Gun
ThingDef.description: A gun that GIVES you health instead of take it away.

ThingDef.label: Useful Gun
ThingDef.description: A useful gun that gives you only useful resources and doesn't break the game

ThingDef.label: Stun Gun
ThingDef.description: A gun that stuns whatever living thing it hits. It stuns the target without being fatal (usually).

ThingDef.label: kill gun
ThingDef.description: A gun that unconditionally kills any living thing it hits.

ThingDef.label: Tame Gun
ThingDef.description:
A gun that unconditionally tames any living thing it hits.
Use this to instantly recruit any pawn or instantly tame any animal. It also tames everythig inside of a 3 block radius, so don't go crazy with it!

ThingDef.label: The Safety Pistol
ThingDef.description:
Do you have an idiot pawn that keeps going on mental breaks and shooting the place up? Do you get raided so often you can't afford to not give this same idiot pawn a gun? Well you might be interested in the safety pistol. The Safety Pistol, like other firearms will deal damage to any enemy that it hits. Unlike a regular firearm, however, it is incapable of inflicting damage via friendly fire. In fact, if you try to shoot a friendly, it won't hurt them. Try it!
This deals 10 points of damage or so making it equivalent to the autopistol.

ThingDef.label: The Safety Gun
ThingDef.description:
A gun that heals friendlies but kills enemies. It's like the safety pistol but better. Does 10 damage.
Pro-tip: Is a colonist on a mental break? Shoot them! A single shot at a colonist will end their mental break! Shooting a friendly, non-mentally broken colonist will cure all of their flesh wounds! (i.e. will not remove joywires, bionic limbs and a few other things you wouldn't normally want removed) Shooting a friendly, non-mentally broken colonist that is in good health will give them a +5 positive mood buff.
Shooting at anything other than a friendly colonist will function like a regular gun though. So don't shoot at things you don't want dead such as cats, trees, caravans (etc).

ThingDef.label: The Mental Health Gun
ThingDef.description:
A gun that allows the user to change the victim's, err, I mean target's mental state. Useful for making even the most wimpy colonists work for you all day long even if their favorite show is on or nobody's letting them eat their tasteless glop at a table.
For maximum effectiveness: assign a "slave driver" pawn who just carries one of these around all day shooting at the idiots that go berserk.
It doubles as a weapon, too. Any human that gets hit that isn't having a mental episode will instantly have a mental break! That makes this gun an effective weapon in combat against unsuspecting raiders.

ThingDef.label: Skill Gun
ThingDef.description:
Tired of having a bunch of incompetent pawns just running amuk left and right? This gun will fix you right up! It increases random skills and replaces worthless or bad traits. If you need more skill points, just keep shooting until satisfied.
It will only work on your own colonists. You wouldn't want to take this into battle and accidently increase some random tribeperson's cooking by 3, now, would you..

ThingDef.label: Machinegun Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description: A reloadable rocket launcher capable of unleashing a lot of rockets at once. Be very careful with this.

ThingDef.label: Large Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description:
A reloadable rocket launcher that causes lots of damage. Laugh as helpless centipedes get slaughtered all over the map in only a single shot.
Be really careful with this.

ThingDef.label: Super Nuke Launcher
ThingDef.description: This is the Super Nuke. It is so powerful that it can wipe out more than half the map in a single shot. It is recommended that you save your game before using this.

ThingDef.label: Massive Rocket Launcher
ThingDef.description: A reloadable rocket launcher that causes massive amounts of damage. With great explosives comes great responsibility. Or something along those lines. This is so goddamned OP. If an idiot pawn gets a hold of this and brings it to a bar fight, it can wipe out your entire base. Seriously. Be careful with this.

ThingDef.label: Beer Launcher
ThingDef.description: Launch beer at things. It's a lot of fun!

ThingDef.label: Weed Launcher
ThingDef.description: Launch weed at things. It's a lot of fun!

ThingDef.label: Trump Gun
ThingDef.description: Build a wall around the map and make the raiders pay for it!

ThingDef.label: Animal Party Launcher
ThingDef.description: It's party time!

ThingDef.label: Everything Launcher
ThingDef.description: This gun shoots everything. Literally. Also, it's kind of damgerous but no one listens to me when I say that so knock yourself out.

li.label: Just farted loudly
li.description: Oh god it smells so bad. I hope no one knows it was me.
